title: League Launcher
body: why does league of legends open 3 to 4 applications when you open the game. In the task manager there are 3 to 4 showing all needed and killing the pc power for no reason.

replies.body: Aside from the client and the game itself, I don't believe there should be more.  When you launch the patcher, do you have to try multiple times before it opens?  Let me know.
no just opening the game once will open 2 or 3 instances of the client.
